title: Video Roundup: Tomas Lemoine gets abducted by aliens? Plus Dillon Lemarr + Commencal, Mike Hopkins + Diamondback & more
content:
As winter weather sets in for many of us, this week’s video roundup starts with Commencal’s Dillon Lemarr relishing the riding in Colorado before snow buries his local trails. Next up we’ll remember our bicycling beginnings with Mike Hopkins as he shows us a humorous, relatable video of hustling as a kid to buy his

The post Video Roundup: Tomas Lemoine gets abducted by aliens? Plus Dillon Lemarr + Commencal, Mike Hopkins + Diamondback & more appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
